name: LESBIAN VAMPIRE DATING ONLINE
description:
You play a vampire helping your vampire bff create her profile, work through her nerves and message local undead hotties in the area! Your thrst (the only vampire dating app specifically for the women who like women) game has never been so strong.

Will she date Margolotta (Brood Queen of the Broken Stair, looking for new thralls. 90s turn (1390s) and proud)? Mahuizoh (Pop culture vamp, otaku, Tenochtitlan before it was cool)? Or, if you find the secret route, maybe even... you? Game made in Twine, it takes about ten minutes to play through!
